name: Move N' Twist
description:
• WASD: Move
  • Spacebar: Jump
  • Click and Drag: Rotate Stage

Get to the top of the level by rotating the stage and scaling upward.

Hi folks! This is a small prototype for an idea I had. I had fun testing it and might expand on this idea more. Let me know what you think and thanks for playing! If you'd like to get in contact with me, you can shoot me a message here or @thebmanishere.
